captions.text: Three times, the machines have sent an assassin back in time
to take the life of my son, John Conner.
Three times, we've been able to stop them.
It's only a matter of time before the machines figure out

they can just go back and kill one of us
in infancy.
There's only one thing that can be done.
We have to terminate the creator of time travel.
(knocking)
Dr. Emmett Brown?
Yes?
(gun shot)
Huhhhhh!!!
Doc!!!
Come with me if you want to live.

You're telling me that not only do I invent
time travel,

but in the future machines will use that
technology to execute just one man?
Terminate.
Terminate just one man?!
That is what I'm telling you
Great scot!
Where is your hall pass? Get outta here you slacker!
(slicing) OHhhhh!!
This is heavy doc, if we're not careful, both of us are gonna be dead.

Marty, evil terminating robots or not,
before we can accomplish anything

we've got to get your parents to that dance
and we've gotta get you back to the future!
But how?!
Who are you?
Now listen to me very carefully.
He's got knives on his hands!
He's an absolute dream!
What are you looking at, butt-head?
(gunshot) UGHHH!!
You know I'm not the enemy...
If we stay the course, we are dead! We are all dead!!
I'm the only hope you have.
So why don't you make like a tree?
And get out of here!

comments.author: It's Russia

comments.text:
It all adds up to:
Doc Brown is the man responsible for time travel, but the reason why the 
terminator wants to kill him is because SkyNet discovered alternative time 
travel technology that doesn't require human tissues ( and Arnold 
Schwarzenegger), Doc lived long enough to give the information to John 
Conner & others. So the Liquid Terminator trying to kill him so that the 
humans can't use time travel.
And as for Marty & his parents, Sarah Connor is actually their first 
daughter, Sarah is Marty's sister, they had to give away her to an 
orphanage where she got adopted & raised by different parents. At some 
point in the 80s Marty & Doc become friends , Doc managed to build first 
time travel technology, only it's a car. During this time the Liquid 
Terminator is sent to kill John Conor while he's still a baby, but 
accidentally discover Doc Brown, and changes it's objective to Terminate 
Doc Brown, which succeeds causing Marty to go back to 50s, but Doc only 
faked his death to send him to the past & being a genius Doc managed to 
build first weapons strong enough & destroyed the Liquid terminator . Upon 
arrival he interrupts his parents first meeting & also meets another 
Terminator (Schwarzenegger) which explains him that SkyNet sent another 
Liquid Terminator to kill Doc Brown since the Delorian is in the hands of 
Marty which means humanity still has a technology for time travel. And the 
three of them Marty, Doc & Schwarzenegger Terminator manages to terminate 
Liquid Terminator (with the cost of Schwarzenegger Terminator), unite 
Marty's parents & sent Marty back in time, only finding out that Doc is 
Alive. 

Marty currently is one of the Leaders of the Humanity, He didn't told John 
Connor that he is his uncle, as for Doc he along Marty survived the 
judgement day but got captured by SkyNet, and was forced to build time 
travel technology, top prevent it, Doc instead tricked SkyNet & build 
technology that can send only live tissues. He died from old age in Skynet 
before revealing more.﻿
